nodes.title: Cloud Native CMS/DXP for Joomla

Oracle 出品的低代码应用开发平台，懂 PL/SQL 开发更有优势

overview.overview: Joomla! is an award-winning content management system (CMS), which enables you to build Web sites and powerful online applications.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html:
This is a repackaged Joomla with professional support for your business. Joomla! is an award-winning content management system (CMS), which enables you to build Web sites and powerful online applications. Many aspects, including its ease-of-use and extensibility, have made Joomla! the most popular Web site software available.

Image Components: Joomla 4.0, Apache 2.4, PHP 7.3, MySQL 5.7, Redis 5.0, Docker 20.10, phpMyAdmin 5.1 on Amazon Linux 2.

EC2 requirements: CPU no less than 1 core, Memory no less than 1G.

Applicable Scene: Corporate Web sites or portals. Corporate intranets and extranets. Online magazines, newspapers, and publications. E-commerce and online reservations. Personal or family homepages.

Disclaimer: We can't guarantee the open source software does not have vulnerability or the security risks which is the responsibility of user according to the open source licenses.

Intellectual Property Statement: The stack of this offer includes a wide range copies of open source and free software, but the Copyrights, Patents and Trademarks are legal protections for original owner.

Take Joomla! as an example:

The Joomla!® name and logo are trademarks of Open Source Matters, Inc. in the United States and other countries. Joomla-cms is licensed under the GNU General Public License v2.0.

If you are aware of a breach of the any IP in this offer, please don't hesitate to contact us: legal@websoft9.com, we will correct it ASAP.

faq.key: 如何设置数据库默认连接？
faq.value: 向文件 path/joomla/installation/model/forms/database.xml 中，添加 default="xxxx" 即可
